steps.intention: Determine effect of pelican increase on fish
steps.note: The text indicates that an increase in pelicans leads to a decrease in fish due to predation.

steps.code: effect = 'decrease'; options = [{'label': 'A', 'text': 'decrease'}, {'label': 'B', 'text': 'nothing'}, {'label': 'C', 'text': 'increase'}, {'label': 'D', 'text': 'none of the above'}]; answer = next(opt['label'] for opt in options if opt['text'] == effect)
